Uses of Interface
org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse.EventListener

  • Packages that use EventListener 
    Package Description
    org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse
    Support for Server Sent events in Jersey.
    org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse.internal  

    • Uses of EventListener in org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse

      Classes in org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse that implement EventListener 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  EventSource
      Client for reading and processing incoming Server-Sent Events.
      Methods in org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse with parameters of type EventListener 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void EventSource.register​(EventListener listener)
      Register new event listener to receive all streamed SSE events.
      void EventSource.register​(EventListener listener, String eventName, String... eventNames)
      Add name-bound event listener which will be called only for incoming SSE events whose name is equal to the specified name(s).

    • Uses of EventListener in org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse.internal

      Classes in org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse.internal that implement EventListener 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  EventProcessor
      Private event processor task responsible for connecting to the SSE stream and processing incoming SSE events as well as handling any connection issues.
      Methods in org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse.internal with parameters of type EventListener 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static EventProcessor.Builder EventProcessor.builder​(WebTarget target, AtomicReference<EventProcessor.State> state, ClientExecutor clientExecutor, EventListener eventListener, EventProcessor.ShutdownHandler shutdownHandler)
      Create new Event processor builder.
      Method parameters in org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse.internal with type arguments of type EventListener 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      EventProcessor.Builder EventProcessor.Builder.boundListeners​(Map<String,​List<EventListener>> boundListeners)
      Unbounded listeners will get notified about incoming events with particular name.
      EventProcessor.Builder EventProcessor.Builder.unboundListeners​(List<EventListener> unboundListeners)
      Unbounded listeners will get notified about any incoming event.
